GET /api.description: returns a JSON representation of all available endpoints of the api

GET /api/projects.description: returns every single project in an array (for displaying the project files with titles)

GET /api/projects/:projectID.description: returns all information (projects, project_details, images) about one project (activated when clicking a file)

POST /api/projects.description: adds a new project to the database (with project_details and images included)

PATCH /api/projects/:projectID.description: edits an existing project using the project ID

PATCH /api/projectDetail/:projectID/:pro.description: edits an existing project detail using the ProjectID and ProjectDetailID
